text: Pearlie is a 2009-11 Australian/Canadian children's animated educational TV series produced by Australian animation studio Sticky Pictures and Canadian studio Nelvana. It was and produced in association with Canadian Television Channel YTV and Austrailan Television Network Network Ten. title: Pearlie
